channel.title: Py Humble Games
channel.description: Awesome RSS Feeds about HumbleBundle Games bundles!

item.title: Bandai Namco: Fights, Frights, and Fantasy
item.content:encoded: Get ready to experience the legendary fighting, fantastic worlds, horrific foes, and timeless games of Bandai Namco! Take on your rivals in TEKKEN 7, the most recent release in the iconic series. Embark on a journey to escape the living nightmare of Code Vein. Restore the stars as the Prince of All Cosmos in Katamari Demacy REROLL. Get God Eater 3, Tales of Vesperia: Definitive Edition, and more—and help support One Tree Planted with your purchase!

item.title: Laugh Til You Die: Multiplayer Mayhem
item.content:encoded: Gather up your friends and frenemies for some mischief and mayhem with this bundle of wild multiplayer games! Cook up chaos in the 4-player roguelike restaurant game PlateUp! Race through an obstacle course that you’re building as you go in Ultimate Chicken Horse. Master dueling skills as the tension mounts in Rounds. Plot a preposterous party, and help support International Medical Corps & International Rescue Committee with your purchase!

item.title: Awesome Indies from Humble Games
item.description: Tons of good fun from Humble Games
item.content:encoded: Discover awesome games from some of the world’s most creative, visionary independent developers in this eclectic collection of titles published by Humble Games (hey, that’s us)! Meet your maker in the unforgiving world of Moonscars. Explore a forgotten city and race to save your friends in UNSIGHTED. Become a champ in the vibrant school sports RPG Dodgeball Academia, journey into the Deep Woods of The Wild at Heart, and much more—and help support Direct Relief with your purchase.

item.title: Control the Narrative
item.content:encoded: Bask in the freedom of choice and face the finality of consequence in this bundle of player-driven narrative games! Guide an eclectic ensemble through a series of madcap sci-fi trials and tribulations in New Tales From the Borderlands. Drive the fates of two characters who share a psychic bond in the critically acclaimed Beyond: Two Souls. Confront your hometown’s troubled past in Twin Mirror, get lost in the visual novel-style adventure of Opus: Echoes of Starsong, and much more—and help support the National Videogame Museum!
